channel.title: Edit my server with eclipse?
channel.description: Heard that eclipse was better :P How do I compile with eclipse? and do I have to restart server to see the things I've added

item.title: Edit my server with eclipse?
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:539573”][quote author=loruviam link=topic=658413.msg4404085#msg4404085 date=1391368141]

You will need to press the debug button (probably at the top of the window pane coloured in green like a play button?) then you will need to log into your server. You will need to ‘restart’ your server (ie disconnect and reconnect) to see changes. Good luck.

oh i see :o thank you But what’s the difference between a single compiler and eclipse :o
[/quote]Eclipse uses a compiler, the only difference is Eclipse filters out what you see and automates a lot of processes to make coding a little less tedious, alongside a host of other features including code completion, better error detection etc.

ooh thank you i’ll use eclipse but is it long to learn how to use it?

it takes a little getting used to but if you’re serious about learning how to program you’re going to end up using it anyways so you might as well learn now[/quote]
Yh i was like fuck that how could i work with notepad++?! Eclipse is my favourite IDE when it comes to programming, but it will take a bit till you know how to use it:) Btw. You don’t need to go to the debug mode to compile lol just ctrl + s and then just restart…

Gl anyways

Read full topic
